Add 10 monster ICONS
Add Spawn points monster preview
Add the save function of the previous day
Add a settlement process
Added altar scanning and character knife light effects
Optimize bullet trajectory
----------------------------------

Witch Rider is a tower defense game with RPG elements.

Background:
In the world of demons, the gods lowered several altars to contend with demons.
And you, guided by the altar, will take the form of a demon hunter knight, defend the altar, and slay demons.


Reasonable construction:
During the day, you need to set up various hunting facilities in appropriate locations according to the terrain.


Each facility has its own unique features, such as defensive towers, armor-piercing ballistas, various traps, walls to block monsters, scary bombs, and more. If you build them properly, you'll get twice the result with half the effort.


Extensive skills:
After defending the altar, it will bless you with a variety of active and passive skills to choose from, create your own genre, and easily cope with the next nightmarish night.


Varied terrain:
Forest, snow, desert, swamp and other terrain for you to explore.


A variety of monsters:
Monsters are humanoid, beast, corpse, ghost, demon and so on. Attributes vary, some are super fast, some have super high defense. It needs to be handled carefully. Defeat them or be hacked to death by them.


Features:
Building a defense tower or a house? It's fun.
A variety of skills with any combination, highly free skill schools waiting for you to create.
Rich terrain, clever levels, defensive strategy up to you.

God will protect you. Go bravely, Witch Rider !
